user_persona: A policy analyst who wants to get an overview of all regulatory policies.
user_goal: To quickly navigate to the full list of policies from the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Dashboard Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Mae lands on the lavender-themed homepage and sees a summary of key metrics. She notices a 'View All Policies' link.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'View All Policies' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Mae is redirected to the full policy listing page.

requirement_tested: Data visualization capabilities for complex regulatory policies
user_persona: A government researcher interested in understanding policy trends.
user_goal: To explore detailed analytics by interacting with a chart.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Policy Trends Visualization
narrative_steps.description: Derek hovers over segments of a pie chart showing jurisdiction distribution to see exact percentages.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over segments of the pie chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip appears displaying percentage data and contextual information for each jurisdiction.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Related Data
narrative_steps.description: Derek clicks on a specific segment of the chart to filter the related policy list.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a chart segment.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The associated list of policies updates to show only those relevant to the selected jurisdiction.

user_persona: A legislative assistant looking up recent policy enactments.
user_goal: To browse through different policies and access details about one.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling Through Policies
narrative_steps.description: Jamie scrolls down the list of policy cards, which dynamically load more items as she reaches the bottom.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down the policy list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional policy cards are loaded seamlessly without page refresh.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Policy
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks on a policy card titled 'Digital Privacy Act Amendment' to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the selected policy card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is taken to the detailed view page for that policy.

user_persona: An economic advisor assessing policy impacts.
user_goal: To perform an impact assessment using built-in analysis tools.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Analysis Tool Panel
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on the 'Impact Assessment Calculator' icon from the analysis toolbar.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Impact Assessment Calculator' icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal window opens where Alex can input parameters for analysis.

requirement_tested: Related data display for each policy
user_persona: A compliance officer gathering supporting documentation.
user_goal: To find and preview related documents for a specific policy.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Related Data Section
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks the expand arrow next to the 'Related Data' section on a policy detail page.
narrative_steps.action: Click the expand arrow under 'Related Data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of attached documents and external references becomes visible.

narrative_steps.title: Previewing a Document
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on a PDF titled 'Implementation Guidelines' to review its contents inline.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the PDF file link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The document previewer loads the PDF within the browser window.

user_persona: A public policy student studying historical trends.
user_goal: To drill down into specific timeframes using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Zooming Into Time-Series Data
narrative_steps.description: Jordan drags across a timeline chart to focus on policy changes during a particular year range.
narrative_steps.action: Drag across the timeline chart area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart zooms into the selected timeframe, updating axes and data points accordingly.

narrative_steps.title: Toggling Data Series Visibility
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on a legend item to hide certain categories and simplify the view.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a legend item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The corresponding data series disappears from the chart temporarily.

user_goal: To filter policies by category and apply the selection.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Riley selects 'Healthcare' from the category dropdown and clicks 'Apply Filters'.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Healthcare' in the category filter and click 'Apply Filters'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only healthcare-related policies are displayed in the list.

user_persona: A journalist compiling a report on recently enacted laws.
user_goal: To sort policies by enactment date to identify the newest ones first.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Sort Order
narrative_steps.description: Maya selects 'Date Enacted Descending' from the sort dropdown menu.
narrative_steps.action: Choose 'Date Enacted Descending' from the sort dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The policy list reorders itself to show the most recently enacted policies at the top.

requirement_tested: Landing page with lavender background color
user_persona: A first-time visitor exploring the platform.
user_goal: To verify consistent styling across the site.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Page Background
narrative_steps.description: Quinn visits the landing page and observes the overall color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Load the landing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire background of the page is consistently lavender (#E6E6FA).

requirement_tested: UI elements styled with indigo color
user_persona: A UX designer evaluating interface consistency.
user_goal: To confirm that UI components use the correct indigo accent.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Buttons
narrative_steps.description: Sage hovers over a primary button and checks its appearance.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a primary button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button color slightly lightens or darkens while maintaining the indigo tone.

user_persona: A legal intern searching for specific legislation.
user_goal: To locate a policy using a keyword search.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Search Query
narrative_steps.description: Leo starts typing 'Tax Reform' into the search bar and sees auto-suggested matches.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Tax Reform' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Predictive suggestions appear below the input field filtered by matching titles/descriptions.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Term
narrative_steps.description: Leo presses Enter after entering the search term.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter in the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Leo is directed to a results page showing policies matching the query.

user_persona: A city planner reviewing local ordinances.
user_goal: To access referenced material from a policy's detailed view.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to External Reference
narrative_steps.description: Patricia clicks on a hyperlinked citation within the policy detail page.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a hyperlinked citation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Patricia is taken directly to the cited external legal resource or another policy page.

user_persona: A research coordinator preparing reports for stakeholders.
user_goal: To export policy data for offline analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Export Process
narrative_steps.description: Nina clicks the 'Export' button on a policy detail page and chooses CSV format.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export' button and select 'CSV'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Browser prompts a download dialog for the generated CSV file containing policy data.

user_persona: An administrative staff member logging into the system.
user_goal: To securely log in and access personalized dashboard content.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Omar enters his username and password and submits the login form.
narrative_steps.action: Enter credentials and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Omar is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard tailored to his assigned role.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out
narrative_steps.description: After finishing work, Omar logs out from the profile menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Logout' from the profile menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session ends and Omar is returned to the login screen.

user_persona: A remote worker accessing the platform on both desktop and mobile.
user_goal: To ensure seamless experience regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Layout Responsiveness
narrative_steps.description: Fiona resizes her browser window and watches how the layout adapts.
narrative_steps.action: Resize the browser window.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page elements adjust spacing, stacking order, and font sizes smoothly based on viewport width.

narrative_steps.title: Rotating Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Fiona rotates her phone from portrait to landscape mode while viewing the dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Rotate the mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout rearranges appropriately to fit the new screen orientation.
